类型: Color: Grey Frame Grey LensLens Width: 54 Millimeters
评论详情: Tad bit small for my face, but they’re still decent. If you have a big head, or at least a head with some width, you MIGHT want to reconsider. I wear them occasionally, and I like them, but they’d 100% be much better about 5mm wider. I find myself wearing my older shades more still. The lack of width puts pressure on the nerves above my ears.  Smoky clear design, decent quality over all. If you’re looking for a blackout lens, this isn’t it though. It almost seems as if you’re not even wearing sunglasses. ALMOST. There is some dimming/light blocking, but it’s very much a bright lens. I’m sure the UV protection is there, but if you have light sensitivity like me, it’s not blacked out enough. Too much hassle to return them, so I’ll keep wearing them very occasionally, or give them to my son.

评论详情: Se ven muy bien puestas,y su material es bastante fuerte con bisagras de metal,buen producto👌🏼 Estos lentes son espectaculares, pero me ha pasado dos veces que he pedido me han llegado de un color más oscuro que el que indica la foto,las primeras me llegaron del color correcto que sería un gris claro,se me perdieron y pedí otras nuevamente porque me gustaron bastante,las próximas que me pedí llegaron con el cristal más oscuro,solicité un remplazo y me llegaron del color deseado,ahora las pido por tercera vez para un regalo y me vuelven a llegar con el cristal más oscuro que en la descripción,solicité nuevamente un remplazo.esto es algo a tener en cuenta con este producto,al menos me ha pasado con las de marco gris y lente gris

类型: Color: Black Frame Leopard TempleLens Width: 54 Millimeters
评论详情: These are very nice sunglasses, definitely one of the nicest pairs I’ve ever had.  I generally stick with aviators but figured I’d switch it up slightly and try these.  And I love them.  They are very high quality, both in material and construction.  The frames are solid without being too heavy.  The lenses are great, with both crisp vision and I’ve protection.  They are certainly dark enough to keep me from squinting in the sun. And I personally think they look super slick. I highly recommend these.
